meanings: (뒤로) step[stand] back, go[move] back(ward), back off, (놀람·무서움 등으로) draw back (=물러서다)

vlive.korean: 일부러 몇 발자... 물러나인가? Purposely a couple... Is it go away? 듣기 View video KIM JAEHWAN(김재환) : [🎬] 째니타임즈⏰ EP.23 가요대제전 현장 비하인드
vlive.english: Purposely a couple... Is it go away?

vlive.korean: 일부러 몇 발자국 물러나~ I take a couple of steps back purposely. 듣기 View video KIM JAEHWAN(김재환) : [🎬] 째니타임즈⏰ EP.23 가요대제전 현장 비하인드
vlive.english: I take a couple of steps back purposely.

vlive.korean: 50분에 딱 깔끔하게 물러나겠습니다. so I'll finish it at 50 minutes. 듣기 View video PENTAGON : Shinwon say something
vlive.english: so I'll finish it at 50 minutes.

vlive.korean: [카메라 감독2] [뒤로 물러남] 줌 당길게요. [Camera director 2] [Moves back] I'll use the zoom function. 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : 편의점 재료만으로 양식을? 최현석 청소 요정으로 이직하다! <초이가이버> 15회
vlive.english: [Camera director 2] [Moves back] I'll use the zoom function.

vlive.korean: 저희는 이만 물러나도록 하겠습니다. We'll be on our way then. 듣기 View video FNC NEOZ SCHOOL : [CNBLUE 정신 X AOA 설현] LOVE FNC 미얀마 봉사활동기 해피빈 기부라이브
vlive.english: We'll be on our way then.

examples.korean: Like a tenacious marketer, the politician will not just go away. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 끈질긴 외판원처럼 그 정치인은 그냥 물러나지는 않을 것이다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Like a tenacious marketer, the politician will not just go away. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I could not help standing back. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 물러나지 않을 수 없었다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I could not help standing back. Add to Wordbook
